I am the Data Science Team Lead at N26. Over five years in data Iâ€™ve optimized digital marketing, applied machine learning to the contemporary art world, built an award winning project in an open data hackathon, and taken on a series of positions at a rather ambitious Berliner fintech. At the present, I am working on: building and mentoring data science teams scaling and managing product-driven ML and data science services developing best practices for data science in a product-driven organization If we have common interests, please get in touch: hello@jeremiahlewis.
